meanings.definition: A type of flowering plant with long clusters of purple or white flowers.
meanings.sent1: The wistaria in our garden blooms beautifully every spring.
meanings.sent2: I love the delicate scent of wistaria flowers in the air.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the wistaria vines to swing from tree to tree.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter cascaded through the room like a cascade of wistaria blooms.
meanings.sent5: The wistaria draped over the trellis like a royal cloak.

meanings.definition: The color of the flowers of the wistaria plant.
meanings.sent1: She painted her room in a lovely shade of wistaria.
meanings.sent2: The artist mixed blue and purple to create the perfect wistaria hue.
meanings.sent3: The dress she wore to the party was an elegant wistaria color.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky in shades of wistaria and gold.
meanings.sent5: The wistaria tint of the walls gave the room a calming atmosphere.
